hours_text:
## **Operation Hours**

#### Regular Hours

Wednesday – Saturday 10:00AM to 4:00PM (Group tours of 10 or more are available on Tuesdays with museum approval)

#### Holiday Hours

In general, the museum is closed on Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year’s Day. Additional closings may apply and will be posted on the website in that event.

#### Inclement Weather Schedule

The museum observes the same inclement weather schedule as the Halifax County School System.

* * *

## **Admission**

The museum proudly adheres to an admission-free policy. There is no cost to enter the museum and to enjoy our displays and exhibits; however, donations help us maintain this policy and are gladly accepted.

* * *

## **Tours**

Guided tours are available with upon request and with advance notice. To schedule a tour, please [contact](mailto:info@sbhcmuseum.org) the museum to make arrangements.

# **How Many Can You Find This Winter?**

The public is encouraged to stop by the museum and check out all its many exhibits and displays. And while there, see how many snowflakes you can find throughout the museum.

For additional information, contact the museum at 434-572-9200 or email [info@sbhcmuseum.org](mailto:info@sbhcmuseum.org).

The museum is located at 1540 Wilborn Ave., South Boston, VA 24592.
